comments:
Description:
ArrayIndexOutofBoundException when edit joinds2 in attached report.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report.
2. edit joinds2

Result:
Exception throws. I'm not sure whether there are some errors in the join data set, but it should not throw ArrayIndexOutofBoundException

The flatfile data source is attached in bug #161348.
This is caused by the old issue in FlatFileQuery that has been already solved

After recreate flat file dataset, the issue is disappeared.
Close it.
*** Bug 161348 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
